summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 63rd Street to East 70th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7788 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
